message: Ce imas grafo, ki ima npr 256 rama ali se v biosu APERAUTURE SIZE nastavi na 256 ali na 128?  Nekje sem prebral da se nastavi ravno na polovico kot ima grafa rama,  spet drugi pravijo, da se nastavi na enako vrednost kot je količina pomnilnika na grafični.  Kako je sedaj otpimalno?

Adrian Rojak's BOG - AGP Aperture Size It is recommended that you keep the AGP aperture around 64MB to 128MB in size, even if your graphics card has a lot of onboard memory. This allows flexibility in the event that you actually need extra memory for texture storage.
Moj bios sam nastavi in zaklene na 128, ko dam na turbo settings. Drugače pa je najbolj merodajno, če zadevo stestiraš.
